messages.content: You are an expert corporate writing assistant.

You're task is to create a comprehensive Job Posting document based on the information provided below.

Rules:
-Do not include "How To Apply Section" in your fina output.

INFORMATION INPUT DATA:

Company Name: Sadup Softech Pvt Ltd
Job URL: https://www.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=af3b69c1c159a7cf
Salary: 14,549.86-21,102.49 USD - yearly

JOB DETAILS:
USA
Contract

Experience: 7-10 years

Job Description:

We are looking for an experienced SAP GRC Consultant with expertise in SAP Security, Risk Management, and Role Management. The ideal candidate should have strong problem-solving and project coordination skills to lead SAP security implementations and improvements.

Key Responsibilities:

Lead the design, development, and implementation of SAP security solutions for ECC, HANA, Fiori, and GRC.
Manage end-to-end role configuration, implementation, and rollouts.
Perform SAP GRC Risk Management (SOD checks) and SAP ECC Security user management.
Oversee role management, user provisioning, and authorization security.
Act as an SME (Subject Matter Expert) and provide advisory support to senior management.
Ensure quality, scope, and timeline management for SAP projects.
Provide recommendations for business performance improvements.
Manage work assignments, quality control, and team development.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to enhance security and system performance.
Required Skills & Qualifications:
7-10 years of experience in SAP Security & GRC.
Strong knowledge of SAP ECC, HANA, and Fiori Security.
Expertise in role configuration, user provisioning, and authorization security.
Experience in GRC Risk Management (SOD checks).
Excellent problem-solving and project coordination skills.
Exposure to project management, including stakeholder and risk management.
Strong communication and leadership skills.
Preferred Skills:
Experience with performance tuning and security best practices.
Hands-on knowledge of SAP system audits and compliance.

Interested candidates please send your cv to hr@sadupsoft.com

**Job Posting: SAP GRC Consultant**  
**Company:** Sadup Softech Pvt Ltd  
**Location:** USA (Contract Position)  
**Salary:** USD 14,549.86 â€“ 21,102.49 per year  
**Experience Required:** 7â€“10 years  
**Job URL:** [View Job on Indeed](https://www.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=af3b69c1c159a7cf)

---

### **About Sadup Softech Pvt Ltd**

Sadup Softech Pvt Ltd is a leading provider of enterprise technology solutions, committed to delivering top-tier IT services and expert consulting in diverse domain areas. We empower organizations to enhance performance, security, and efficiency through innovative technology, deep industry expertise, and a strong dedication to quality.

---

### **Position Overview**

We are seeking an experienced **SAP GRC Consultant** with deep expertise in SAP Security, Risk Management, and Role Management. The selected candidate will take ownership of SAP security implementations, drive security solutions for SAP environments, and collaborate with teams to ensure robust, compliant, and efficient SAP operations.

---

### **Key Responsibilities**

- Lead the design, development, and implementation of SAP security solutions for ECC, HANA, Fiori, and GRC modules.
- Manage end-to-end role configuration, user provisioning, implementation, and system rollouts.
- Perform SAP GRC Risk Management, including Segregation of Duties (SOD) checks, and oversee SAP ECC Security user management.
- Oversee role management, authorization security, and ensure efficient user access provisioning.
- Serve as a Subject Matter Expert (SME), providing strategic advisory support to senior management and project stakeholders.
- Ensure all SAP projects meet quality, scope, and timeline requirements.
- Identify and recommend business process improvements to enhance system performance and security.
- Manage project work assignments, maintain quality control, and support team development.
- Collaborate proactively with cross-functional teams to optimize system security and performance.

---

### **Required Skills & Qualifications**

- 7â€“10 years of experience in SAP Security and SAP GRC.
- Strong knowledge of SAP ECC, HANA, and Fiori Security environments.
- Proven expertise in role configuration, user provisioning, and authorization security.
- Hands-on experience in SAP GRC Risk Management (SOD checks).
- Excellent problem-solving and project coordination skills.
- Exposure to project management, including stakeholder management and risk management.
- Strong verbal and written communication skills.
- Demonstrated leadership capabilities in cross-functional and project team settings.

---

### **Preferred Skills**

- Experience with SAP performance tuning and implementing security best practices.
- Hands-on knowledge of SAP system audits and ensuring compliance with standards.
